io.micronaut.ignite.configuration

Class DefaultCacheConfiguration<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.cache.configuration.MutableConfiguration<K,V>
      • org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration<K,V>
        • io.micronaut.ignite.configuration.DefaultCacheConfiguration<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the cache key
    V - the cache value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.naming.Named, java.io.Serializable, javax.cache.configuration.CompleteConfiguration<K,V>, javax.cache.configuration.Configuration<K,V>

    @IgnitePrimary
 @EachProperty(value="ignite.cache-configurations",
              excludes={"cacheLoaderFactory","cacheWriterFactory","expiryPolicyFactory","evictionPolicyFactory","affinity","cacheStoreFactory","nearConfiguration","evictionFilter","nodeFilter","interceptor","pluginConfigurations","topologyValidator","cacheStoreSessionListenerFactories","affinityMapper","keyConfiguration"})
public class DefaultCacheConfiguration<K,V>
extends org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration<K,V>
implements io.micronaut.core.naming.Named
    Ignite cache configuration.
